The viral image of Baba Ramdev visibly i: surrounded by doctors and a man in orange robes wearing a medical mask, was shared on social media platforms, including Facebook and Twitter.
The image was posted by a Facebook page: Ravish's Army' and shared 10,000 times. It was also shared by a Twitter user.
Alt News performed a reverse image searc: which reported that Ramdev broke a nine-day hunger strike against black money in Dehradun Hospital on June 12, 2011. This suggests that the claim associated with the viral image is false.
